original_text: The horse shakes with joy as it runs to the battle. When the battle trumpet makes its noise, the horse wants to run even faster! 39: A soldier would make a noise with a trumpet when the battle was ready to start. Then all the soldiers would know that it was the time for them to attack their enemy. The horse shakes with joy as it runs to the battle. korean_text: 땅을 삼킬 듯이 맹렬히 성내며 나팔 소리에 머물러 서지 아니하고
